title: Client Crashes: Hextech Crafting
body: My client crashes without fail every time after a game if I go to the Hextech Crafting Grid. This is happening to a large amount of my friends as well.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're in the process of investigating what's going on here. I've had this happen to me as well - re-logging seemed to do the trick. Super sorry for the inconvenience! D:

Re-logging didn't help at all, but repairing did.

EDIT:
now it's doing it again, post-repair :(
Bump, been happening to me too for days now
I've had this issue since they released Hextech but I'd always thought it was just me until a bunch of other people told me it was happening too :/
